html:
Nov 17 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Almirall SA, Deutsche Pfandbriefbank and Tecnicas Reunidas, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Almirall SA ALM.MC: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG PBBG.DE: Citigroup cuts to sell from buy

* Diasorin SpA DIAS.MI: Kepler Cheuvreux cuts to hold from buy

* Marks and Spencer Group MKS.L: Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

* Tecnicas Reunidas TRE.MC: Kepler Cheuvreux cuts to reduce from hold


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* 3I Group III.L: CFRA raises target price to 1330p from 1260p

* Aareal Bank AG ARLG.DE: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 32 from EUR 26.1

* Aareal Bank AG ARLG.DE: Independent Research ups PT to EUR 24.50 from EUR 24.00; sell

* Aedifica NV AOO.BR: Citigroup initiates coverage with buy rating; target price EUR 158.8

* Almirall SA ALM.MC: Deutsche Bank cuts target price to EUR 11 from EUR 18

* Almirall SA ALM.MC: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* Almirall SA ALM.MC: Morgan Stanley cuts target price to EUR 16.5 from EUR 18

* ArcelorMittal SA MT.AS: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 52 from EUR 50

* Asos Plc ASOS.L: Jefferies cuts target price to 4,050p from 5,800p

* Atlantia ATL.MI: CFRA raises target price by EUR 2 to EUR 18

* Deutsche Lufthansa AG LHAG.DE: Exane BNP Paribas raises to neutral from underperform

* Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG PBBG.DE: Citigroup cuts to sell from buy

* Diageo DGE.L: Berenberg raises target price to 3900p from 3700p
